mainGoal: gain freelance clients by showcasing work and demonstrating value
colorScheme: Soft white or light gray background, muted teal or deep blue accents, dark charcoal or black text, optional warm color like coral or mustard
features: Interactive Project Gallery – With filters (e.g., web, design, branding) and lightbox previews
Testimonial Section – Short quotes from clients or collaborators to build trust
Integrated Social Media Links – Icons linked to LinkedIn, GitHub, and Instagram
Contact Form – With basic validation and optional file upload
Responsive Design – Optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop
Resume Download Button – Optional, linked to a PDF version of my CV
